feed.title: mikal's shared items in Google Reader

entry.title: Stanhope's $1b light rail vision - Local News - News - General - The Canberra Times
entry.content:
Shared by mikal
Awesome. Canberra has needed something better than buses between the towncenters for a while, and light rail seems like a great way to do it. I much prefer trains to buses, and catch a light rail service to work every day when I am in Mountain View.
Canberra could become the light rail capital of Australia with a $1 billion system linking the city centre, airport and parliamentary triangle.
entry.gr:annotation: Awesome. Canberra has needed something better than buses between the towncenters for a while, and light rail seems like a great way to do it. I much prefer trains to buses, and catch a light rail service to work every day when I am in Mountain View.
